item.title: Data loading pipeline in Tensorflow
item.description: Data is the most critical part for deep learning. The very popularity of deep neural nets roots in the huge amount of data we possess now. However, dealing with large dataset is always tricky, since if not properly handled, it might significantly slow down the training pipeline or bias the model we trained. Tensorflow, the most popular deep learning framework of the time, supports the efficient loading of data as well.
